verses.name: Ezra 8:22
verses.text: For I was ashamed to require of the king a band of soldiers and horsemen to help us against the enemy in the way: because we had spoken unto the king, saying, The hand of our God is upon all them for good that seek him; but his power and his wrath is against all them that forsake him.

verses.name: Ezra 8:23
verses.text: So we fasted and besought our God for this: and he was intreated of us.

verses.name: Ezra 8:24
verses.text: Then I separated twelve of the chief of the priests, Sherebiah, Hashabiah, and ten of their brethren with them,
